page.title: 01THE AREA IN GENERAL
page.content: {The land is mainly used for farming {eg.dairy and beef,but}sometimes cereal crops are grown eg. barley(for feeding to beef cattle). The holdings are either{medium sized farms}(about 100_200 acres) or{small_holdings, {although some}properties are purely residential, occupied by either retired people or people working out of the area. The roads are often very narrow with high hedges on either side. The roads are often muddy because they are used as a means of{moving cattle {from one field to another.}Other roads are very bumpy as the tarmac surface has worn away.{Some of the roads are {just small tracks used by tractors.
